title: The Convict (1951 Drama) Directed by Willy Rozier | Trapped by Fate, Escaped by Will

sources.title: The Convict (1951 Drama) Directed by Willy Rozier | Trapped by Fate, Escaped by Will
sources.description:
Dr. Julien, a GP in Marseilles, gets wrongly convicted and sent to a remote prison. After escaping, he finds redemption when he helps an indigenous tribe combat a yellow fever epidemic, discovering hope for a new life in the process.

Original title: Le bagnard (1951)
Alternative title: The Convict

Directed by Willy Rozier & writer as Xavier Vallier

Main cast:
Pierre Gay - Dr. Julien
Lili Bontemps - Marie-Lou
Juliette Faber - Pilar
Lucien Nat - Messner
Milly Mathis - Mrs. Rosano
Colette Der√©al - Emma
Marco Villa - Ratichon
Georges Sellier - Professor Elie Dubois
Lucien Callamand - Lawyer Gloriette
Daniel Mendaille - Plantation Boss
Henry Houry - Defense Lawyer

This film is available with original French audio, and subtitles in many languages


Release date: March 7, 1951
Filming location: Nice, Marseille, French Guiana

B&W version: hhttps://youtu.be/kbh9p-zQjRw
